sentences.cn: 有助于恢复健康的假期

sentences.en: As a rule , Scorpios have strong, voluptuous bodies and excellent recuperative powers.
sentences.cn: 概括来说, 天蝎座人有强壮的身体并且恢复能力强.

sentences.en: Heat transfer principle and enhancing heat transfer way of recuperative drier with volume heat are described.
sentences.cn: 叙述了间壁式体积传热干燥器传热原理及强化传热的途径.

sentences.en: His remarkable recuperative powers have proved themselves.
sentences.cn: 他那出众的复原能力得到充分的表现.

sentences.en: Human beings have great recuperative powers.
sentences.cn: 人类具有很强的自我康复能力。

words.tran_cn: 复原的；恢复的；有恢复力的

trans.tran_en: recuperative powers, abilities etc help someone or something get better again, especially after an illness
